content.heading: PROGRAM
description: A luxurious retreat in the heart of Tuscany's wine country.
Every day guests will be invited to a morning and an afternoon session of active listening. Each session will last 2/3 hours, including a 15 minutes break.
Thursday: Arrival & Welcome
Arrival: Private transfer from Rome Fiumicino Airport to villa (4:00 p.m. check-in).
Evening: Welcome cocktail on terrace; dinner featuring Tuscan coastal cuisine and local wine pairings.
Opening of audiovisual installation.
Friday: Culinary Experience & Leisure
Morning: Breakfast showcasing regional specialties.
Daytime: Leisure at villa, access to beach, audiovisual installation active throughout stay.
Optional: sunset hike to historical watchtower (10 min. hiking). Guests should bring bathing suits, sunglasses, a sun hat, and a pair of walking shoes or boots in case of hiking.
Lunch & Dinner: In-villa meals with local wine pairings, highlighting regional flavors.
Saturday: Optional Cultural Excursion & Relaxation
Morning: Breakfast with local offerings.
Optional Excursions:
- Submarine Museum (Talamone) – scuba experience to underwater sculptures.
- Giardino dei Tarocchi (Capalbio) – visit to renowned sculpture garden.
Lunch & Dinner: Villa dining with curated local wines.
Sunday: Departure
Morning: Final breakfast.
Check-Out: 11:00 a.m.; private transfer to Fiumicino Airport. Optional lunch stop en route based on flight schedules.
INCLUSIONS:
- Private Transportation: Round-trip transfers from Rome Fiumicino Airport to the villa, local transportation for optional excursions and activities.
- Accommodation: 4-day, 3-night stay in a luxury villa with oceanfront views and private access.
- Culinary Experiences: Daily breakfast, lunch, and dinner with menus crafted around authentic local cuisine. Curated wine pairings with each meal.
- Audiovisual Experience: Permanent audiovisual installation in the villa, active throughout the stay.
- Leisure and Activity Options: Private beach access, optional guided sunset hike, cultural excursions like the Submarine Museum or the Giardino dei Tarocchi.
- Concierge Services: 24/7 concierge assistance for guests.
EXCLUSIONS:
- Airfare: Flights to and from Rome Fiumicino Airport are not included.
- Diving Certification: Scuba diving certifications are not provided for the Submarine Museum experience.
- Personal Expenses: Personal purchases or incidental expenses.
- Travel Insurance: Guests are responsible for their own travel insurance.
- Additional On-Demand Services: Any spa treatments, private tours, or special requests.
- Gratuities: Tips for drivers, guides, and villa staff are not included.
